## EntityEventPayloads."ENTITY.STOP\_MODEL\_ANIMATIONS" property

Emitted when the model animations of the entity are stopped.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[EntityEvent.STOP_MODEL_ANIMATIONS]: {
        entity: Entity;
        animations: Set<string>;
    };
```
